track.name: I Think, I Love
comments: So beautiful...makes me want to be in love.
I know I love this song and wish I had a man love me this much...The sentiment is wonderfully heartfelt and beautiful......
I know, I love... YOU ANCA! XXX

Jamie you can't get better than this. Ok, you can, but this...this piece of art you made *-*. the melody doesn't even let you know the lyrics are romantic BUT a bit playful, especially because of that part about the taxi and the wine xD
unbelievably beautiful! I think I love this song : )

It fits perfectly to a cold and white winter evening on a large red couch and a warm blanket in front of a big old oven with the darling and a bottle of wine, while this song comes out of a gramophone record.
The maturing of his sound is just...like how wine gets better with age?
I think, I love this song.
His most sensitive song, the best of his.
ich denke ich liebe, also bin ich:-)
Oh, this song is so beautiful!  Definitely made me cry the first time I listened to it!
